PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-07772017-06-20,  ,  AAFC,  , 
ActCanada Grain Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Grain Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA GRAIN REGULATIONS in order to (1) limit the accumulation of additional surplus in the Canada Grain Commission revolving fund related to official inspection and official weighing fees; (2) update the fees to reflect the costs of providing official inspection and official weighing services; and (3) reduce the transactional burden of tracking and billing for official inspection overtime costs.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0125 Publication Date: 2017-07-12
AttachmentsAttachment
